name: Porygon
bad_description: It can convert its body into digital data, which enables it to enter cyberspace.

name: Surskit
bad_description: It appears as if it is skating on water. It draws prey with a sweet scent from the tip of its head.

name: Shuckle
bad_description: A this Pokémon hides under rocks, keeping its body concealed inside its shell while eating stored berries. The berries mix with its body fluids to become a juice.

name: Swadloon
bad_description: Preferring dark, damp places, it spends the entire day eating fallen leaves that lie around it.

name: Uxie
bad_description: It is said that its emergence gave humans the intelligence to improve their quality of life.

name: Eevee
bad_description: Because its genetic makeup is irregular, it quickly changes its form due to a variety of causes.

name: Piplup
bad_description: A poor walker, it often falls down. However, its strong pride makes it puff up its chest without a care.

name: Jangmo-O
bad_description: They learn to fight by smashing their head scales together. The dueling strengthens both their skills and their spirits.

name: Dragalge
bad_description: Tales are told of ships that wander into seas where this Pokémon live, never to return.

name: Larvitar
bad_description: this Pokémon is born deep under the ground. To come up to the surface, this POKéMON must eat its way through the soil above.Until it does so, this Pokémon cannot see its parent’s face.

name: Bagon
bad_description: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.

name: Altaria
bad_description: If it bonds with a person, it will gently envelop the friend with its soft wings, then hum.

name: Tympole
bad_description: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans. It uses the rhythm of these sounds to talk.

name: Porygon
bad_description: A POKéMON that consists entirely of programmingcode. Capable of moving freely in cyberspace.

name: Makuhita
bad_description: It was originally brought in from another region, but now this Pokémon from Alola are more famous.

name: Gengar
bad_description: Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you.It is actually a this Pokémon running past you, pretending to be your shadow.

name: Cyndaquil
bad_description: It has a timid nature. If it is startled, the flames on its back burn more vigorously.

name: Crobat
bad_description: Both of its legs have turned into wings. Without a sound, this Pokémon flies swiftly toward its prey and sinks its fangs into the nape of its target’s neck.

name: Machoke
bad_description: It happily carries heavy cargo to toughen up. It willingly does hard work for people.

name: Gyarados
bad_description: Once this Pokémon goes on a rampage, its ferociously violent blood doesn’t calm until it has burned everything down.There are records of this POKéMON’s rampages lasting a whole month.

name: Hariyama
bad_description: this Pokémon practices its straight-arm slaps in any number of locations. One hit of this Pokémon’s powerful, openhanded, straight-arm punches could snap a telephone pole in two.

name: Butterfree
bad_description: The wings are protected by rain-repellent dust. As a result, this POKéMON can fly about even in rain.

name: Dragalge
bad_description: this Pokémon uses a poisonous liquid capable of corroding metal to send tankers that enter its territory to the bottom of the sea.

name: Phanpy
bad_description: As a sign of af­ fection, it bumps with its snout.However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.

name: Froslass
bad_description: It freezes prey by blowing its -58 degrees F breath. It is said to then secretly display its prey.

name: Flareon
bad_description: this Pokémon’s fluffy fur releases heat into the air so that its body does not get excessively hot. Its body temperature can rise to a maximum of 1,650 degrees F.

name: Golem
bad_description: It sheds its skin once a year. The discarded shellimmediately hard­ ens and crumbles away.

name: Ampharos
bad_description: The tail’s tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.

name: Meganium
bad_description: The aroma that rises from its petals contains asubstance that calms aggressive feelings.

name: Kirlia
bad_description: If its Trainer becomes happy, it overflows with energy, dancing joyously while spinning about.

name: Gloom
bad_description: A horribly noxious honey drools from its mouth. One whiff of the honey can result in memory loss. Some fans are said to enjoy this overwhelming stink, however.

name: Nidoqueen
bad_description: Its hard scales provide strong protection. Ituses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.

name: Chinchou
bad_description: It discharges positive and negative electricity from its antenna tips to shock its foes.

name: Golem
bad_description: Even dynamite can’t harm its hard, boulder-like body. It sheds its hide just once a year.

name: Heracross
bad_description: This Pokémon takes pride in its strength, which allows it to lift things 100 times heavier than itself with no trouble at all.

name: Grovyle
bad_description: Its strongly developed thigh muscles give it astounding agility and jumping performance.

name: Beartic
bad_description: They love the cold seas of the north. They create pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their own breath.

name: Mudkip
bad_description: The fin on this Pokémon’s head acts as highly sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense movements of water and air, thisPOKéMON can determine what is taking place around it without using its eyes.

name: Weedle
bad_description: this Pokémon has an extremely acute sense of smell. It is capable of distinguishing its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikes just by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).

name: Mesprit
bad_description: When this Pokémon flew, people learned the joy and sadness of living. It was the birth of emotions.

name: Lairon
bad_description: this Pokémon tempers its steel body by drinking highly nutritious mineral springwater until it is bloated. This Pokémon makes its nest close to springs of delicious water.

name: Fearow
bad_description: It cleverly uses its thin, long beak to pluck and eat small insects that hide under the ground.

name: Typhlosion
bad_description: this Pokémon obscures itself behind a shimmering heat haze that it creates using its intensely hot flames. This Pokémon creates blazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.

name: Venipede
bad_description: It discovers what is going on around it by using the feelers on its head and tail. It is brutally aggressive.

name: Glaceon
bad_description: It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs then become like needles it can fire.

name: Mudbray
bad_description: It loves playing in the mud. If it isn’t showered with mud on a daily basis, it gets stressed out and stops listening to its Trainer.

name: Riolu
bad_description: It has the peculiar power of being able to see emotions such as joy and rage in the form of waves.

name: Slowbro
bad_description: Though usually dim witted, it seems to become inspired if the SHELLDER on its tail bites down.

name: Hariyama
bad_description: It loves challenging others to tests of strength. It has the power to stop a train with a slap.

name: Silcoon
bad_description: It prepares for evolution using the energy it stored while it was a WURMPLE. It keeps watch over the surroundings with its two eyes.

name: Pinsir
bad_description: This Pokémon clamps its pincers down on its prey and then either splits the prey in half or flings it away.

name: Lopunny
bad_description: Extremely cautious, it quickly bounds off when it senses danger.

name: Umbreon
bad_description: On the night of a full moon, or when it gets excited,the ring patterns on its body glow yellow.

name: Baltoy
bad_description: It moves by spinning on its foot. It is a rare Pokémon that was discovered in ancient ruins.

name: Igglybuff
bad_description: It has a very soft body. If it starts to roll, it will bounce all over and be impossible to stop.

name: Tapu-Bulu
bad_description: It makes ringing sounds with its tail to let others know where it is, avoiding unneeded conflicts. This guardian deity of Ula’ula controls plants.

name: Joltik
bad_description: Since it can’t generate its own electricity, it sticks onto large-bodied Pokémon and absorbs static electricity.

name: Arbok
bad_description: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.

name: Mothim
bad_description: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.

name: Latias
bad_description: Its body is covered with a down that can refract light in such a way that it becomes invisible.

name: Gengar
bad_description: To steal the life of its target, it slips into theprey's shadow and silently waits for an opportunity.

name: Chikorita
bad_description: It uses the leaf on its head to determine the temperature and humidity. It loves to sunbathe.

name: Cascoon
bad_description: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.

name: Sliggoo
bad_description: It drives away opponents by excreting a sticky liquid that can dissolve anything. Its eyes devolved, so it can’t see anything.

name: Espeon
bad_description: It can instantaneously sense its opponent’s movements by feeling air currents with its fine fur.

name: Swinub
bad_description: It has a very sensitive nose. It can locate mushrooms, berries, and even hot springs buried under ice.

name: Dragonair
bad_description: If its body takes on an aura, the weather changes instantly. It is said to live in seas and lakes.

name: Bellossom
bad_description: When the heavy rainfall season ends, it is drawn out by warm sunlight to dance in the open.

name: Prinplup
bad_description: It lives a solitary life. Its wings deliver wicked blows that can snap even the thickest of trees.

name: Eevee
bad_description: Thanks to its unstable genetic makeup, this special Pokémon conceals many different possible evolutions.

name: Skitty
bad_description: It is said to be difficult to earn its trust. However, it is extremely popular for its cute looks and behavior.

name: Shellder
bad_description: This Pokémon’s tongue is always hanging out. It uses its tongue with great dexterity to dig up sand from the seabed in its search for food.

name: Eevee
bad_description: Its genes are easily influenced by its surroundings. Even its face starts to look like that of its Trainer.

name: Caterpie
bad_description: Its body is soft and weak. In nature, its perpetual fate is to be seen by others as food.

name: Mime-Jr
bad_description: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokémon.

name: Kirlia
bad_description: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.

name: Flaaffy
bad_description: If its coat becomes fully charged with electricity, its tail lights up. It fires hair that zaps on impact.

name: Fraxure
bad_description: After battle, this Pokémon carefully sharpens its tusks on river rocks. It needs to take care of its tusks—if one breaks, it will never grow back.

name: Espurr
bad_description: The organ that emits its intense psychic power is sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.

name: Omastar
bad_description: Once wrapped around its prey, it never lets go. It eats the prey by tearing at it with sharp fangs.

name: Regice
bad_description: Research revealed that its body is made of the same kind of ice that is found at the South Pole.

name: Ariados
bad_description: It spins string not only from its rear but also fromits mouth. It is hard to tell which end is which.

name: Dunsparce
bad_description: It digs into the ground with its tail and makes a mazelike nest. It can fly just a little.

name: Tauros
bad_description: Once it takes aim at its foe, it makes a headlong charge. It is famous for its violent nature.

name: Metagross
bad_description: this Pokémon is the result of two METANG achieving fusion. When hunting, this POKéMON pins the prey to the groundunder its massive body. It then eats the helpless victim using the large mouth on its stomach.

name: Croconaw
bad_description: Once it bites down, it won’t let go until it loses its fangs. New fangs quickly grow into place.

name: Latios
bad_description: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.

name: Petilil
bad_description: The deeper the color of a this Pokémon’s leaves, the healthier the Pokémon is. this Pokémon sometimes makes its home in a well-tended field or flowerbed.

name: Combee
bad_description: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.

name: Umbreon
bad_description: When exposed to the moon’s aura, the rings on its body glow faintly and it gains a mysterious power.

name: Cherrim
bad_description: During times of strong sunlight, its bud blooms, its petals open fully, and it becomes very active.

name: Treecko
bad_description: The soles of its feet are covered by countless tiny spikes, enabling it to walk on walls and ceilings.

name: Bayleef
bad_description: The buds that ring its neck give off a spicy aroma that perks people up.

name: Spinda
bad_description: No two this Pokémon have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.

name: Crawdaunt
bad_description: A rough customer that wildly flails its giant claws. It is said to be extremely hard to raise.

name: Armaldo
bad_description: It went ashore after evolving. Its entire body is clad in a sturdy armor.

name: Gloom
bad_description: Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor. The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance of 1.25 miles.

name: Slowpoke
bad_description: Slow-witted and oblivious, this Pokémon won’t feel any pain if its tail gets eaten. It won’t notice when its tail grows back, either.

name: Venonat
bad_description: Its coat of thin, stiff hair that covers its entire body is said to have evolved for protection. Its large eyes never fail to spot even miniscule prey.

name: Cradily
bad_description: It ensnares prey with its eight tentacles. It then melts the prey with a strong acid before feeding.

name: Steelix
bad_description: The iron it ingested with the soil it swallowed transformed its body and made it harder than diamonds.

name: Metapod
bad_description: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.

name: Clauncher
bad_description: this Pokémon’s claws can fall off during battle, but they’ll regenerate. The meat inside the claws is popular as a delicacy in Galar.

name: Electivire
bad_description: When it gets excited, it thumps its chest. With every thud, thunder roars and electric sparks shower all around.

name: Clamperl
bad_description: It is protected by a sturdy shell. Once in a lifetime, it makes a magnificent pearl.

name: Weepinbell
bad_description: A Pokémon that appears to be a plant. It captures unwary prey by dousing them with a toxic powder.

name: Emolga
bad_description: As it flies, it scatters electricity around, so bird Pokémon keep their distance. That’s why this Pokémon can keep all its food to itself.

name: Phione
bad_description: A Pokémon that lives in warm seas. It inflates the flotation sac on its head to drift and search for food.

name: Graveler
bad_description: This slow-footed Pokémon moves by curling up and rolling instead of walking. With enough momentum, its speed can exceed 60 mph.

name: Drowzee
bad_description: Puts enemies to sleep, then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating only bad dreams.

name: Seel
bad_description: Covered with light blue fur, its hide is thick and tough. It is active in bitter cold of minus 40 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Squirtle
bad_description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

name: Timburr
bad_description: Always carrying squared logs, they help out with construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.

name: Swellow
bad_description: It circles the sky in search of prey. When it spots one, it dives steeply to catch the prey.

name: Miltank
bad_description: this Pokémon gives over five gallons of milk on a daily basis. Its sweet milk is enjoyed by children and grown-ups alike.People who can’t drink milk turn it into yogurt and eat it instead.

name: Surskit
bad_description: From the tips of its feet, this Pokémon secretes an oil that enables it to walk on water as if it were skating. This Pokémon feeds on microscopic organisms in ponds and lakes.

name: Jolteon
bad_description: A sensitive Pokémon that easily becomes sad or angry. Every time its mood changes, it charges power.

name: Hitmontop
bad_description: After doing a handstand to throw off the opponent’s timing, it presents its fancy kick moves.

name: Yanma
bad_description: this Pokémon is capable of seeing 360 degrees without having to move its eyes. It is a great flier that is adept at making sudden stops and turning midair. This Pokémon uses its flying ability to quickly chase down targeted prey.

name: Ho-Oh
bad_description: Its feathers are in seven colors. It is said that anyone seeing it is promised eternal happiness.

name: Larvitar
bad_description: It feeds on soil. After it has eaten a large mountain, it falls asleep so it can grow.

name: Azumarill
bad_description: this Pokémon can make balloons out of air. It makes these air balloons if it spots a drowning Pokémon. The air balloons enable the Pokémon in trouble to breathe.

name: Blitzle
bad_description: When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear. It can catch lightning with its mane and store the electricity.

name: Butterfree
bad_description: Water-repellent powder on its wings enables itto collect honey, even in the heav­ iest of rains.

name: Wurmple
bad_description: Often targeted by bird Pokémon, it desperately resists by releasing poison from its tail spikes.

name: Parasect
bad_description: It scatters toxic spores from its mushroom cap. Once harvested, these spores can be steeped and boiled down to prepare herbal medicines.

name: Cosmoem
bad_description: As it absorbs light, this Pokémon continues to grow. Its golden shell is surprisingly solid.

name: Shellder
bad_description: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

name: Bibarel
bad_description: It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.

name: Kangaskhan
bad_description: It raises its offspring in its belly pouch. It lets the baby out to play only when it feels safe.

name: Altaria
bad_description: As it flies in a calm and relaxed manner, this Pokémon performs a humming song that would enrapture any audience.

name: Duskull
bad_description: this Pokémon wanders lost among the deep darkness of midnight. There is an oft- told admonishment given to misbehavingchildren that this POKéMON will spirit away bad children who earn scoldings from their mothers.

name: Riolu
bad_description: It has the peculiar power of being able to see emotions such as joy and rage in the form of waves.

name: Budew
bad_description: Sensitive to changing temperatures, the bud blooms when it’s warm, releasing toxic pollen.

name: Tapu-Koko
bad_description: This guardian deity of Melemele is brimming with curiosity. It summons thunderclouds and stores their lightning inside its body.

name: Nidorino
bad_description: this Pokémon has a horn that is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence, all the barbs on its backbristle up at once, and it challenges the foe with all its might.

name: Blastoise
bad_description: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

name: Gardevoir
bad_description: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.

name: Sharpedo
bad_description: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as “The Bully of the Sea.”

name: Charizard
bad_description: If this Pokémon be­ comes furious, the flame at the tipof its tail flares up in a whitish- blue color.

name: Shuckle
bad_description: this Pokémon quietly hides itself under rocks, keeping its body concealed inside its hard shell while eating berries it has stored away. The berries mix with its body fluids to become a juice.

name: Gulpin
bad_description: There is nothing its stomach can’t digest. While it is digesting, vile, overpowering gases are expelled.

name: Slowbro
bad_description: Though usually dim witted, it seems to become inspired if the SHELLDER on its tail bites down.

name: Braixen
bad_description: When the twig is plucked from its tail, friction sets the twig alight. The flame is used to send signals to its allies.

name: Charmeleon
bad_description: In the rocky mountains where this Pokémon live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.

name: Wigglytuff
bad_description: As it inhales, it expands...and expands...and expands. this Pokémon compete to see which one can inflate itself the most.

name: Simisear
bad_description: When it gets excited, embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it loves sweets.

name: Kommo-O
bad_description: Its rigid scales function as offense and defense. In the past, its scales were processed and used to make weapons and other commodities.

name: Scizor
bad_description: This Pokémon’s pincers, which contain steel, can crush any hard object it gets ahold of into bits.

name: Metapod
bad_description: Inside the shell, it is soft and weak as it pre­pares to evolve. It stays motion­ less in the shell.

name: Cradily
bad_description: It ensnares prey with its eight tentacles. It then melts the prey with a strong acid before feeding.

name: Sudowoodo
bad_description: It mimics a tree to avoid being attacked by enemies. But since its forelegs remain green throughout the year, it is easily identified as a fake in the winter.

name: Zubat
bad_description: Emits ultrasonic cries while it flies. They actas a sonar used to check for ob­ jects in its way.

name: Minior
bad_description: Originally making its home in the ozone layer, it hurtles to the ground when the shell enclosing its body grows too heavy.

name: Solrock
bad_description: A new Pokémon species, rumored to be from the sun. It gives off light while spinning.

name: Pupitar
bad_description: Its body is as hard as bedrock. By venting pressurized gas, it can launch itself like a rocket.

name: Magmortar
bad_description: When launching 3,600 degrees F fireballs, its body takes on a whitish hue from the intense heat.

name: Abra
bad_description: Using its psychic power is such a strain on its brain that it needs to sleep for 18 hours a day.

name: Electivire
bad_description: It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power.

name: Sandaconda
bad_description: Its unique style of coiling allows it to blast sand out of its sand sac more efficiently.

name: Pupitar
bad_description: Even sealed in its shell, it can move freely. Hard and fast, it has outstanding destructive power.

name: Latios
bad_description: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.

name: Marowak
bad_description: This Pokémon is out for vengeance on its natural enemy, Mandibuzz. It throws bones like boomerangs to try to take it down.

name: Vileplume
bad_description: this Pokémon has the world’s largest petals. They are used to attract prey that are then doused with toxic spores. Once the prey are immobilized, this Pokémon catches and devours them.

name: Clefable
bad_description: this Pokémon moves by skipping lightly as if it were flying using its wings. Its bouncy step lets it even walk on water. It is known to take strolls on lakes on quiet, moonlit nights.

name: Spoink
bad_description: It bounces constantly, using its tail like a spring. The shock of bouncing keeps its heart beating.

name: Salamence
bad_description: It’s uncontrollable if enraged. It flies around spouting flames and scorching fields and mountains.

name: Kingdra
bad_description: It sleeps deep on the ocean floor to build its energy. It is said to cause tornadoes as it wakes.

name: Aron
bad_description: It usually lives deep in mountains. However, hunger may drive it to eat railroad tracks and cars.

name: Nidorino
bad_description: It has a violent disposition and stabs foes with its horn, which oozes poison upon impact.

name: Pikachu
bad_description: It lives in forests with others. It stores electricity in the pouches on its cheeks.

name: Relicanth
bad_description: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.

name: Houndoom
bad_description: Long ago, people imagined its eerie howls to be the call of the grim reaper.

name: Alakazam
bad_description: It has an IQ of 5000. It calcu­ lates many thingsin order to gain the edge in every battle.

name: Fraxure
bad_description: A broken tusk will not grow back, so it diligently sharpens its tusks on river rocks after the end of a battle.

name: Carbink
bad_description: Born from the temperatures and pressures deep underground, it fires beams from the stone in its head.

name: Ivysaur
bad_description: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower’s coming bloom.

name: Ditto
bad_description: It can freely recombine its own cellular structure to transform into other life-forms.

name: Linoone
bad_description: this Pokémon always runs full speed and only in straight lines. If facing an obstacle, it makes a right-angle turn to evade it.This POKéMON is very challenged by gently curving roads.

name: Articuno
bad_description: A legendary bird Pokémon. It freezes water that is contained in winter air and makes it snow.

name: Voltorb
bad_description: It looks just like a Poké Ball. It is dangerous because it may electrocute or explode on touch.

name: Eevee
bad_description: Thanks to its unstable genetic makeup, this special Pokémon conceals many different possible evolutions.

name: Ribombee
bad_description: It can predict the weather from moisture levels and wind direction. this Pokémon only reveals itself when there are a few clear days in a row.

name: Cutiefly
bad_description: It feeds on the nectar and pollen of flowers. Because it’s able to sense auras, it can identify which flowers are about to bloom.

name: Zorua
bad_description: this Pokémon is a timid Pokémon. This disposition seems to be what led to the development of this Pokémon’s ability to take on the forms of other creatures.

name: Gardevoir
bad_description: this Pokémon has the ability to read the future. If it senses impending danger to its Trainer, this Pokémon is said to unleash its psychokinetic energy at full power.

name: Skarmory
bad_description: Its sturdy wings look heavy, but they are actually hollow and light, allowing it to fly freely in the sky.

name: Omastar
bad_description: It is thought that this Pokémon became extinct because its spiral shell grew too large.

name: Cubone
bad_description: Wears the skull of its deceased mother. Its cries echo inside the skull and come out as a sad melody.

name: Fletchling
bad_description: These friendly Pokémon send signals to one another with beautiful chirps and tail-feather movements.

name: Aggron
bad_description: While seeking iron for food, it digs tunnels by breaking through bedrock with its steel horns.

name: Espeon
bad_description: this Pokémon is extremely loyal to any TRAINER it considers to be worthy. It is said that this POKéMON developedits precognitive powers to protect its TRAINER from harm.

name: Vaporeon
bad_description: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridgedwith a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.

name: Luvdisc
bad_description: Its heart-shaped body makes it popular. In some places, you would give a this Pokémon to someone you love.

name: Sceptile
bad_description: The leaves that grow on its arms can slice down thick trees. It is without peer in jungle combat.

name: Venomoth
bad_description: The powdery scales on its wings are hard to remove.They also contain poison that leaks out on contact.

name: Lickitung
bad_description: Instead of hands, it uses its tongue, which is twice its height. Its sticky saliva grips anything.

name: Feebas
bad_description: this Pokémon’s fins are ragged and tattered from the start of its life. Because of its shoddy appearance, thisPOKéMON is largely ignored. It is capable of living in both the sea and in rivers.

name: Jirachi
bad_description: Generations have believed that any wish written on a note on its head will come true when it awakens.

name: Landorus
bad_description: Lands visited by this Pokémon grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as “The Guardian of the Fields.”

name: Nidoking
bad_description: One swing of its mighty tail can snap a telephone pole as if it were a matchstick.

name: Excadrill
bad_description: More than 300 feet below the surface, they build mazelike nests. Their activity can be destructive to subway tunnels.

name: Hitmontop
bad_description: It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high speed, it may bore its way into the ground.

name: Drowzee
bad_description: It can tell what people are dreaming by sniffing with its big nose. It loves fun dreams.

name: Drowzee
bad_description: It can tell what people are dreaming by sniffing with its big nose. It loves fun dreams.

name: Boldore
bad_description: When it is healthy, its core sticks out. Always facing the same way, it swiftly moves front to back and left to right.

name: Scrafty
bad_description: It can smash concrete blocks with its kicking attacks. The one with the biggest crest is the group leader.

name: Scizor
bad_description: this Pokémon has a body with the hardness of steel. It is not easily fazed by ordinary sorts of attacks. This Pokémon flaps its wings to regulate its body temperature.

name: Cresselia
bad_description: Those who sleep holding this Pokémon’s feather are assured of joyful dreams. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

name: Dragonite
bad_description: It is said that this Pokémon lives somewhere in the sea and that it flies. However, these are only rumors.

name: Glalie
bad_description: Legend says a boulder on an icy mountain absorbed the distress and regrets of a stranded mountaineer, giving rise to this Pokémon.

name: Comfey
bad_description: It picks flowers and sticks them to its body with fluids it produces. The aroma that wafts from its petals has a healing effect.

name: Poliwhirl
bad_description: The spiral pattern on its belly subtly undulates. Staring at it gradually causes drowsiness.

name: Drilbur
bad_description: It’s a digger, using its claws to burrow through the ground. It causes damage to vegetable crops, so many farmers have little love for it.

name: Weepinbell
bad_description: It spits out POISONPOWDER to immobilize theenemy and then finishes it with a spray of ACID.

name: Wurmple
bad_description: It lives among the tall grass and in forests. It repels attacks by raising up the spikes on its rear.

name: Lileep
bad_description: It lived on the seafloor 100 million years ago and was reanimated scientifically.

name: Kadabra
bad_description: Using its psychic power, this Pokémon levitates as it sleeps. It uses its springy tail as a pillow.

name: Croconaw
bad_description: Once it bites down, it won’t let go until it loses its fangs. New fangs quickly grow into place.

name: Registeel
bad_description: Its body is harder than any other kind of metal. The body metal is composed of a mysterious substance. Not only is it hard, it shrinks and stretches flexibly.

name: Volbeat
bad_description: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves Illumise’s sweet aroma.

name: Crobat
bad_description: Having four wings allows it to fly more quickly and quietly so it can sneak up on prey without its noticing.

name: Pupitar
bad_description: Its body is as hard as bedrock. By venting pressurized gas, it can launch itself like a rocket.

name: Lampent
bad_description: This Pokémon appears just before someone passes away, so it’s feared as an emissary of death.

name: Venusaur
bad_description: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokémon.

name: Slowpoke
bad_description: Alolan home cooking involves drying this Pokémon tails and then simmering them into a salty stew.

name: Porygon2
bad_description: Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.

name: Vibrava
bad_description: It vibrates its wings to generate ultrasonic waves, causing its prey to faint. Then it buries the prey alive in the sand to preserve it.

name: Barboach
bad_description: Its slimy body is hard to grasp. In one region, it is said to have been born from hardened mud.

name: Meganium
bad_description: this Pokémon’s breath has the power to revive dead grass and plants. It can make them healthy again.

name: Ribombee
bad_description: It makes pollen puffs from pollen and nectar. The puffs’ effects depend on the type of ingredients and how much of each one is used.

name: Chimecho
bad_description: They fly about very actively when the hot season arrives. They communicate among themselves using seven different and distinguishing cries.

name: Claydol
bad_description: This mysterious Pokémon started life as an ancient clay figurine made over 20,000 years ago.

name: Simisage
bad_description: It attacks enemies with strikes of its thorn-covered tail. This Pokémon is wild tempered.

name: Persian
bad_description: The gem in its forehead glows on its own! It walks with all the grace and elegance of a proud queen.

name: Snubbull
bad_description: Although it looks frightening, it is actually kind and affectionate. It is very popular among women.

name: Vibrava
bad_description: The ultrasonic waves it generates by rubbing its two wings together cause severe headaches.

name: Elgyem
bad_description: Rumors of its origin are linked to a UFO crash site in the desert 50 years ago.

name: Minior
bad_description: Although its outer shell is uncommonly durable, the shock of falling to the ground smashes the shell to smithereens.

name: Fletchinder
bad_description: Its speed right after takeoff already puts it in the top speed class of all bird Pokémon.

name: Unown
bad_description: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.

name: Kingler
bad_description: Its pincers grow peculiarly large. If it lifts the pincers too fast, it loses its balance and staggers.

name: Shelgon
bad_description: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.

name: Chespin
bad_description: Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back that even a direct hit from a truck wouldn’t faze it.

name: Wingull
bad_description: It soars high in the sky, riding on updrafts like a glider. It carries food tucked in its bill.

name: Bergmite
bad_description: They chill the air around them to −150 degrees Fahrenheit, freezing the water in the air into ice that they use as armor.

name: Mankey
bad_description: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile onemoment then thrashing away the next instant.

name: Urshifu
bad_description: Inhabiting the mountains of a distant region, this Pokémon races across sheer cliffs, training its legs and refining its moves.

name: Aron
bad_description: this Pokémon has a body of steel. With one all-out charge, this POKéMON can demolish even a heavy dump truck.The destroyed dump truck then becomes a handy meal for the POKéMON.

name: Luxray
bad_description: It can see clearly through walls to track down its prey and seek its lost young.

name: Lampent
bad_description: It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit from the body.

name: Pupitar
bad_description: Its shell is as hard as sheet rock, and it is also very strong. Its THRASHING can topple a mountain.

name: Frillish
bad_description: Using the invisible poison spikes on its veillike arms and legs, it paralyzes its enemies and causes them to drown.

name: Beldum
bad_description: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.

name: Golduck
bad_description: The forelegs are webbed, helping to make it an adept swimmer. It can be seen swimming elegantly in lakes, etc.

name: Marowak
bad_description: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws thebone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.

name: Magnemite
bad_description: It subsists on electricity. As this Pokémon flies, it emits electromagnetic waves from the units on each side of its body.

name: Rufflet
bad_description: A combative Pokémon, it’s ready to pick a fight with anyone. It has talons that can crush hard berries.

name: Machamp
bad_description: Its four muscled arms slam foes with powerful punches and chops at blinding speed.

name: Voltorb
bad_description: this Pokémon is extremely sensitive—it explodes at the slightest of shocks. It is rumored that it was first created when a Poké Ball was exposed to a powerful pulse of energy.

name: Tapu-Lele
bad_description: As it flutters about, it scatters its strangely glowing scales. Touching them is said to restore good health on the spot.

name: Weezing
bad_description: Top-grade perfume is made using its internal poisongases by diluting them to the high­ est level.

name: Charmeleon
bad_description: In the rocky mountains where this Pokémon live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.

name: Jigglypuff
bad_description: Uses its alluring eyes to enrapture its foe. It thensings a pleasing melody that lulls the foe to sleep.

name: Poliwrath
bad_description: this Pokémon’s highly developed, brawny muscles never grow fatigued, however much it exercises.It is so tirelessly strong, this POKéMON can swim back and forth across the Pacific Ocean without effort.

name: Reshiram
bad_description: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with fire. It helps those who want to build a world of truth.

name: Tentacool
bad_description: Because its body is almost entirely composed of water, it shrivels up if it is washed ashore.

name: Clawitzer
bad_description: Their enormous claws launch cannonballs of water powerful enough to pierce tanker hulls.

name: Kricketot
bad_description: It shakes its head back to front, causing its antennae to hit each other and sound like a xylophone.

name: Excadrill
bad_description: It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has evolved into steel strong enough to bore through iron plates.

name: Fomantis
bad_description: When bathed in sunlight, this Pokémon emits a pleasantly sweet scent, which causes bug Pokémon to gather around it.

name: Geodude
bad_description: When this Pokémon sleeps deeply, it buries itself halfway into the ground. It will not awaken even if hikers step on it unwittingly. In the morning, this Pokémon rolls downhill in search of food.

name: Flareon
bad_description: Once it has stored up enough heat, this POKéMON'sbody temperature can reach up to 1700 degrees.

name: Golbat
bad_description: Its sharp fangs puncture the toughest of hides and have small holes for greedily sucking blood.

name: Loudred
bad_description: The shock waves from its cries can tip over trucks. It stamps its feet to power up.

name: Raichu
bad_description: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.

name: Nidoran-F
bad_description: Although small, its venomous barbs render thisPOKéMON dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

name: Garchomp
bad_description: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.

name: Cottonee
bad_description: Perhaps because they feel more at ease in a group, they stick to others they find. They end up looking like a cloud.

name: Ariados
bad_description: It spews threads from its mouth to catch its prey. When night falls, it leaves its web to go hunt aggressively.

name: Staraptor
bad_description: When Staravia evolve into this Pokémon, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

name: Rufflet
bad_description: It stands up to massive opponents, not out of courage, but out of recklessness. But that is how it gets stronger.

name: Eevee
bad_description: A rare Pokémon that adapts to harsh environments by taking on different evolutionary forms.

name: Magmortar
bad_description: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees F from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.

name: Shellder
bad_description: Even when its shell is closed, its tongue still hangs out. If you give its tongue a good yank, the shock will cause this Pokémon to open its shell.

name: Poliwag
bad_description: Its slick black skin is thin and damp. A part of its internal organs can be seen through the skin as a spiral pattern.

name: Vullaby
bad_description: Its wings are too tiny to allow it to fly. As the time approaches for it to evolve, it discards the bones it was wearing.

name: Fearow
bad_description: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.

name: Armaldo
bad_description: Its enormous, retractable claws can cut through most anything. Its entire body is clad in sturdy plates.

name: Glalie
bad_description: It prevents prey from escaping by instantaneously freezing moisture in the air.

name: Koffing
bad_description: In hot places, its internal gases could expand andexplode without any warning. Be very careful!

name: Girafarig
bad_description: The head on its tail contains a small brain. It can instinctively fight even while facing backward.

name: Cacturne
bad_description: It lives in deserts. It becomes active at night when it hunts for prey exhausted from the desert’s heat.

name: Bellsprout
bad_description: Its bud looks like a human face. Because of the bud, it is rumored to be a type of legendary mandrake plant.

name: Hitmonchan
bad_description: A this Pokémon is said to possess the spirit of a boxer who aimed to become the world champion. Having an indomitable spirit means that it will never give up.

name: Hippopotas
bad_description: It shrouds itself in sand to ward off germs. It travels easily through the sands of the desert.

name: Vanilluxe
bad_description: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and attack their foes with violent blizzards.

name: Lampent
bad_description: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.

name: Primeape
bad_description: When this Pokémon becomes furious, its blood circulation is boosted. In turn, its muscles are made even stronger.However, it also becomes much less intelligent at the same time.

name: Minun
bad_description: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.

name: Whiscash
bad_description: It is extremely protective of its territory. If any foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.

name: Gastly
bad_description: Said to appear in decrepit, deserted buildings. It hasno real shape as it appears to be made of a gas.

name: Reshiram
bad_description: Flames spew from its tail as it flies through the sky like a jet airplane. It’s said that this Pokémon will scorch the world.

name: Breloom
bad_description: Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.

name: Snorlax
bad_description: Its stomach's di­ gestive juices can dissolve any kindof poison. It can even eat things off the ground.

name: Entei
bad_description: Volcanoes erupt when it barks. Unable to restrain its extreme power, it races headlong around the land.

name: Beedrill
bad_description: this Pokémon is extremely territorial. No one should ever approach its nest—this is for their own safety. If angered, they will attack in a furious swarm.

name: Sudowoodo
bad_description: To avoid being attacked, it does nothing but mimic a tree. It hates water and flees from rain.

name: Drowzee
bad_description: It can tell what people are dreaming by sniffing with its big nose. It loves fun dreams.

name: Flareon
bad_description: It has a flame sac in its body. Its body temperature tops 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit before battle.

name: Galvantula
bad_description: They employ an electrically charged web to trap their prey. While it is immobilized by shock, they leisurely consume it.

name: Bellossom
bad_description: When the heavy rainfall season ends, it is drawn out by warm sunlight to dance in the open.

name: Clefairy
bad_description: On nights with a full moon, they gather together and dance. The surrounding area is enveloped in an abnormal magnetic field.

name: Kabuto
bad_description: This species is almost entirely extinct. this Pokémon molt every three days, making their shells harder and harder.

name: Magneton
bad_description: Generates strange radio signals. It raises the tem­perature by 3.6F degrees within 3,300 feet.

name: Starmie
bad_description: It is said that it uses the seven- colored core ofits body to send electric waves into outer space.

name: Entei
bad_description: It is said that when it roars, a volcano erupts somewhere around the globe.

name: Magikarp
bad_description: Its reckless leaps make it easy pickings for predators. On the bright side, many Pokémon enjoy longer life spans, thanks to this Pokémon.

name: Nidoking
bad_description: One swing of its mighty tail can snap a telephone pole as if it were a matchstick.

name: Dusclops
bad_description: Anyone who dares peer into its body to see its spectral ball of fire will have their spirit stolen away.

name: Staravia
bad_description: It lives in forests and fields. Squabbles over territory occur when flocks collide.

name: Sandaconda
bad_description: When it contracts its body, over 220 pounds of sand sprays from its nose. If it ever runs out of sand, it becomes disheartened.

name: Sandshrew
bad_description: To protect itself from attackers, it curls up into a ball. It lives in arid regions with minimal rainfall.

name: Sudowoodo
bad_description: To avoid being attacked, it does nothing but mimic a tree. It hates water and flees from rain.

name: Ponyta
bad_description: As a newborn, it can barely stand. However, through galloping, its legs are made tougher and faster.

name: Gothita
bad_description: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.

name: Ledyba
bad_description: this Pokémon secretes an aromatic fluid from where its legs join its body. This fluid is used for communicating with others. This Pokémon conveys its feelings to others by altering the fluid’s scent.

name: Eelektrik
bad_description: They coil around foes and shock them with electricity-generating organs that seem simply to be circular patterns.

name: Sandslash
bad_description: It climbs trees by hooking on with its sharp claws. this Pokémon shares the berries it gathers, dropping them down to Sandshrew waiting below the tree.

name: Lapras
bad_description: Its high intelligence enables it to understand human speech. It likes to ferry people on its back.

name: Marshtomp
bad_description: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.

name: Machop
bad_description: It hefts a Graveler repeatedly to strengthen its entire body. It uses every type of martial arts.

name: Jirachi
bad_description: It is said to make any wish come true. It is awake for only seven days out of a thousand years.

name: Pansear
bad_description: When it is angered, the temperature of its head tuft reaches 600° F. It uses its tuft to roast berries.

name: Magnemite
bad_description: The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which allows it to float.

name: Gliscor
bad_description: It dances silently through the sky. When it approaches prey, it can land a critical hit in an instant.

name: Ninetales
bad_description: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one ofits many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.

name: Tyrogue
bad_description: It is famous for its eagerness to fight and always nurses injuries from challenging larger foes.

name: Scraggy
bad_description: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling its skin up to its neck.

name: Regieleki
bad_description: Its entire body is made up of a single organ that generates electrical energy. this Pokémon is capable of creating all Galar’s electricity.

name: Volbeat
bad_description: It lives around clean ponds. At night, its rear lights up. It converses with others by flashing its light.

name: Lumineon
bad_description: It lives on the deep-sea floor. It attracts prey by flashing the patterns on its four tail fins.

name: Cofagrigus
bad_description: Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and get too close end up trapped inside their bodies.

name: Grubbin
bad_description: Its strong jaw enables it to scrape trees and slurp out the sap. It normally lives underground.

name: Phione
bad_description: It drifts in warm seas. It always returns to where it was born, no matter how far it may have drifted.

name: Clefairy
bad_description: Bathed in moonlight, its wings glow faintly. Without even flapping, this Pokémon rises into the air, where it dances around.

name: Shedinja
bad_description: A peculiar POKéMON that floats in air even though its wings remain completely still. The inside of its body is hollow and utterly dark.

name: Zweilous
bad_description: While hunting for prey, this Pokémon wanders its territory, its two heads often bickering over which way to go.

name: Slakoth
bad_description: It sleeps for 20 hours every day. Making drowsy those that see it is one of its abilities.

name: Bunnelby
bad_description: They use their large ears to dig burrows. They will dig the whole night through.

name: Hoppip
bad_description: To keep from being blown away by the wind, they gather in clusters. But they do enjoy gentle breezes.

name: Binacle
bad_description: Two this Pokémon live together on one rock. When they fight, one of them will move to a different rock.

name: Mantine
bad_description: If it builds up enough speed swimming, it can fly over 300 feet out of the water from the surface of the ocean.

name: Munchlax
bad_description: Stuffing itself with vast amounts of food is its only concern. Whether the food is rotten or fresh, yummy or tasteless—it does not care.

name: Conkeldurr
bad_description: Rather than rely on force, they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.

name: Clefairy
bad_description: Its adorable appearance makes it popular as a pet. However, it is rare and difficult to find.

name: Buizel
bad_description: It inflates the flotation sac around its neck and pokes its head out of the water to see what is going on.

name: Corsola
bad_description: It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of itshead is prized as a treasure for its beauty.

name: Snover
bad_description: In the spring, it grows berries with the texture of frozen treats around its belly.

name: Wingull
bad_description: It soars high in the sky, riding on updrafts like a glider. It carries food tucked in its bill.

name: Gothita
bad_description: Even when nobody seems to be around, this Pokémon can still be heard making a muted cry. Many believe it’s speaking to something only it can see.

name: Terrakion
bad_description: Spoken of in legend, this Pokémon used its phenomenal power to destroy a castle in its effort to protect Pokémon.

name: Binacle
bad_description: If the two don’t work well together, both their offense and defense fall apart. Without good teamwork, they won’t survive.

name: Farfetchd
bad_description: If anyone tries to disturb where the essential plant stalks grow, it uses its own stalk to thwart them.

name: Caterpie
bad_description: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.

name: Aggron
bad_description: this Pokémon has a horn sharp enough to perforate thick iron sheets. It brings down its opponents by ramming into them horn first.

name: Starmie
bad_description: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.

name: Venusaur
bad_description: It is able to convert sunlight into energy. As a result, it is more powerful in the summertime.

name: Stoutland
bad_description: It pays no mind to the cold, thanks to its long warm coat. this Pokémon in Alola look a little uncomfortable.

name: Lickilicky
bad_description: The long tongue is always soggy with slobber. The saliva contains a solvent that causes numbness.

name: Onix
bad_description: It burrows through the ground at a speed of 50 mph while feeding on large boulders.

name: Mienfoo
bad_description: In fights, they dominate with onslaughts of flowing, continuous attacks. With their sharp claws, they cut enemies.

name: Spearow
bad_description: Farmers whose fields are troubled by bug Pokémon appreciate this Pokémon for its vigorous appetite and look after it.

name: Bidoof
bad_description: It constantly gnaws on logs and rocks to whittle down its front teeth. It nests alongside water.

name: Huntail
bad_description: It’s not the strongest swimmer. It wags its tail to lure in its prey and then gulps them down as soon as they get close.

name: Togekiss
bad_description: It shares many blessings with people who respect one another’s rights and avoid needless strife.

name: Shellos
bad_description: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.

name: Pinsir
bad_description: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers,it will swing it around and toss it hard.

name: Lugia
bad_description: this Pokémon’s wings pack devastating power—a light fluttering of its wings can blow apart regular houses. As a result, this Pokémon chooses to live out of sight deep under the sea.

name: Machamp
bad_description: One arm alone can move mountains. Using all four arms, this Pokémon fires off awesome punches.

name: Turtwig
bad_description: Made from soil, the shell on its back hardens when it drinks water. It lives along lakes.

name: Sunkern
bad_description: It may plummet from the sky. If attacked by a SPEAROW, it will violently shake its leaves.

name: Relicanth
bad_description: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.

name: Leafeon
bad_description: Its cellular composition is closer to that of a plant than an animal. It uses photosynthesis to produce its energy supply without eating food.

name: Walrein
bad_description: this Pokémon’s tusks keep growing throughout its life. Tusks broken in battle will grow back to their usual impressive size in a year.

name: Cherubi
bad_description: It evolves by sucking the energy out of the small ball where it had been storing nutrients.

name: Magneton
bad_description: Many mysteriously appear when more sunspots dot the sun. They stop TV sets from displaying properly.

name: Typhlosion
bad_description: It attacks using blasts of fire. It creates heat shimmers with intense fire to hide itself.

name: Cacnea
bad_description: By storing water in its body, this desert dweller can survive for 30 days without water.

name: Chimecho
bad_description: Its cries echo inside its hollow body to emerge as beautiful notes for startling and repelling foes.

name: Nidoran-M
bad_description: It raises its big ears to check its surroundings.It will strike first if it senses any danger.

name: Roggenrola
bad_description: The hexagonal cavity is its ear. It walks in the direction of sounds it hears, but if the sounds cease, it panics and topples over.

name: Psyduck
bad_description: As this Pokémon gets stressed out, its headache gets progressively worse. It uses intense psychic energy to overwhelm those around it.

name: Blissey
bad_description: this Pokémon lays mysterious eggs that are filled with happiness. It’s said that anyone who eats a this Pokémon egg will start acting kindly to all others.

name: Arcanine
bad_description: this Pokémon is known for its high speed. It is said to be capable of running over 6,200 miles in a single day and night.The fire that blazes wildly within this POKéMON’s body is its source of power.

name: Slugma
bad_description: this Pokémon does not have any blood in its body. Instead, intensely hot magma circulates throughout this Pokémon’s body, carrying essential nutrients and oxygen to its organs.

name: Tauros
bad_description: Once it takes aim at its foe, it makes a headlong charge. It is famous for its violent nature.

name: Weavile
bad_description: They communicate by clawing signs in boulders and work together to surround enemies.

name: Eevee
bad_description: A rare Pokémon that adapts to harsh environments by taking on different evolutionary forms.

name: Swampert
bad_description: If it senses the approach of a storm and a tidal wave, it protects its seaside nest by piling up boulders. It swims as fast as a jet ski.

name: Krookodile
bad_description: Its unique faculty of sight can detect small prey more than 30 miles away, even in the midst of a sandstorm.

name: Nidoqueen
bad_description: this Pokémon is better at defense than offense. With scales like armor, this Pokémon will shield its children from any kind of attack.

name: Golurk
bad_description: There’s a theory that inside this Pokémon is a perpetual motion machine that produces limitless energy, but this belief hasn’t been proven.

name: Vaporeon
bad_description: Its cells are composed of units much like water molecules. It lives close to water and is often mistaken for a mermaid.

name: Chinchou
bad_description: When it senses danger, it discharges positive and negative electricity from its two antennae. It lives in depths beyond sunlight’s reach.

name: Azelf
bad_description: It is thought that Uxie, Mesprit, and this Pokémon all came from the same egg.

name: Gastrodon
bad_description: Long ago, it had a shell on its back. There’s now a vestigial plate on its back that’s hard but thin.

name: Granbull
bad_description: It is timid in spite of its looks. If it becomes enraged, however, it will strike with its huge fangs.

name: Riolu
bad_description: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.

name: Phione
bad_description: It drifts in warm seas. It always returns to where it was born, no matter how far it may have drifted.

name: Audino
bad_description: Using the feelers on its ears, it can tell how someone is feeling or when an egg might hatch.

name: Spearow
bad_description: Very protective of its territory, it flaps its short wings busily to dart around at high speed.

name: Ditto
bad_description: It can transform into anything. When it sleeps, it changes into a stone to avoid being attacked.

name: Gloom
bad_description: What appears to be drool is actually sweet honey. It isvery sticky and clings stubbornly if touched.

name: Genesect
bad_description: This Pokémon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.

name: Metapod
bad_description: Its shell is filled with a thick liquid. All of the cells throughout its body are being rebuilt in preparation for evolution.

name: Arcanine
bad_description: Its magnificent bark conveys a sense of majesty.Anyone hearing it can't help but grovel before it.

name: Heracross
bad_description: this Pokémon loves sweet sap and will go looking through forests for it. The Pokémon uses its two antennae to pick up scents as it searches.

name: Bellsprout
bad_description: Even though its body is extremely skinny, it is blindingly fast when catching its prey.

name: Riolu
bad_description: It can discern the physical and emotional states of people, Pokémon, and other natural things from the shape of their aura waves.

name: Totodile
bad_description: It has the habit of biting anything with its developed jaws. Even its Trainer needs to be careful.
